name: Spooky Scary Scape
description:
Hello everybody thanks for checking out our game.

This game was made for a school project, we hope you have as much fun playing it as we had making it.

We know there is copyrighted music in the game, that´s why we don´t accept donations or monetize the game at all until we find a song that fits with the theme of out game, suggestions are welcome.

our inspiration for this game was subway surfers and minion rush in the gameplay aspect, and spooky´s mansion of jump scares and the original ghostbusters movie in the art aspect

Team Chimera
